instructions: Place the fork on the left half of the table with the tines pointing up.
Place the knife on the right half of the table with the blade pointing left.
Place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the tines pointing up.
Place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade pointing left.
Place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the bowl pointing upwards.
Place the dessert spoon in the middle horizontally with the bowl pointing to the left.
Move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon with the bowl pointing upwards.
Move the dessert spoon to the middle and place horizontally with the bowl pointing to the left.
Place the dinner plate under the dessert spoon and left of the dinner knife.
Place the bread plate above the forks and to the left of the dessert spoon.
Place the butter knife across the top left of the bread plate with the blade pointing downwards.
Place the wine glass directly above the soup spoon and even with the dessert spoon.
Place the water glass between the wine glass and the dessert spoon.
Place the folded napkin on the dinner plate with the fold pointing to the left.
